front.title: IEEE/IEC Draft International Standard for Explosive Atmospheres

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: It provides recommendations for the design, installation, maintenance and repair of trace heating equipment and associated control and monitoring equipment. It does not cover devices that operate by induction heating, skin effect heating or direct pipeline heating, nor those intended for stress relieving.This part supplements the requirements specified in IEC 60079-30-1.
